Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [](javascript:;) Collect 36 Boots Advantage Card points with this purchase [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) Qu-Chi Hayfever & Allergic Rhinitis Acupressure Arm Band The Natural Choice - Drug free - Non-drowsy - Natural The Qu-Chi ('Q-chee') point has been used for thousands of years in traditional chinese medicine to pull excess energy away from the face. The Original Qu-Chi Band has been designed to sit comfortably on this point, which is at the end of the outer part of the elbow crease. It can be worn whenever needed and for as long as necessary, be it day or night. Suitable for Adults Size guide: 15cm-40cm How to use Please see back of pack for fitting instructions 1. Bend the elbow 2. Locate the Qu-Chi point - this is the depression at the end of the crease that appears when you bend your arm 3. Place the Qu-Chi band so the black Qu-Chi point is resting in the Qui-Chi point 4. Position the band round the upper and lower arm Hazards and Cautions - Do not wear during pregnancy, as this point has been used to induce labour. - If you have problems with circulation in your arm, then please consult your doctor before use. - Do not stop any prescribed medication without consulting your doctor. - If the band is uncomfortable or causes pain then remove it.
